testcase.name: Podam should not fill POJO's attributes annotated with @PodamExclude
Podam should handle both native and wrapped integer values with @PodamIntValue annotation
Podam should handle both native and wrapped boolean values with @PodamBooleanValue annotation
Podam should handle both native and wrapped byte values with @PodamByteValue annotation
Podam should handle both native and wrapped char values with @PodamCharValue annotation
Podam should handle both native and wrapped double values with @PodamDoubleValue annotation
Podam should throw an exception if the @PodamIntegerValue annotation contains invalid characters

error.message: The annotation value: hfajkfhalfh could not be converted to an Integer. An exception will be thrown.

testcase.error: The annotation value: hfajkfhalfh could not be converted to an Integer. An exception will be thrown.
testcase.system-err: The annotation value: hfajkfhalfh could not be converted to an Integer. An exception will be thrown. uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.getIntegerValueWithinRange(PodamFactoryImpl.java:751) uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.resolveBoxedValue(PodamFactoryImpl.java:999) uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.manufactureAttributeValue(PodamFactoryImpl.java:1557) uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.populatePojoInternal(PodamFactoryImpl.java:1395) uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.manufacturePojoInternal(PodamFactoryImpl.java:1244) uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.manufacturePojo(PodamFactoryImpl.java:175) uk.co.jemos.podam.test.unit.steps.PodamInvocationSteps.whenIInvokeTheFactoryForClass(PodamInvocationSteps.java:13) uk.co.jemos.podam.test.unit.features.annotations.AnnotationsTest.podamShouldThrowExceptionWhenPodamIntegerValueContainsInvalidCharacters(AnnotationsTest.java:509)

testcase.name: Podam should assign exactly the values specified with the @PodamStrategyValue annotation

testcase.name: Podam should handle both native and wrapped float values with @PodamFloatValue annotation
Podam should handle POJOs with constructors that have one or more self references to the POJO class, provided the required constructor is annotated with @PodamConstructor
Podam should handle both native and wrapped long values with @PodamLongValue annotation
Podam should handle both native and wrapped short values with @PodamShortValue annotation
Podam should throw an exception if the @PodamStrategyValue annotation contains the wrong strateg type
Podam should throw an exception if the @PodamShortValue annotation contains invalid characters

testcase.name: Podam should assign precise values and lengths when a String is annotated with @PodamStringValue
